nodes.content: Hey you! How are you doing tonight? It's pretty late... do you not have school tomorrow??
Yeah but I got a lot of homework so I needed something to snack on I guess
Well this looks like a nice treat. Best of luck with that homework of yours....
There's this [wave]really creepy person[/wave] hanging out around the store.
I can't really do anything about it because they're not breaking any laws.
But it might be best if you just don't engage with them, yeah?
